quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因形近词"noun"（名词）误判为"名词性事物"，或因词根"nou-"（类似"know"）错推为"已知的知识对象"，或与"phenomenon"（现象）混淆
quiz_item.sentence: In Kant's philosophy, the **noumenon** is the thing-in-itself that exists independently of human perception, distinct from the observable phenomenon we experience through our senses.

option.definition: 名词性事物；名词相关的实体
已知的知识对象；可被认知的事物
可观察的现象；感官体验到的事物
